Package com.sun.jna.platform

Klasse EnumUtils

java.lang.Object
com.sun.jna.platform.EnumUtils
public class EnumUtils extends Object
Several helper methods to convert integer flag (sets) into enum (sets)
Autor:
Martin Steiger

      clazz - the enum class

    • setToInteger

      Gibt zurück:
